title: Three years of war push Russia’s inflation past 10 per cent
description:

title: RBI rate cut: NIM outlook to improve in 2HFY26; check top picks after monetary policy
description: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has announced a reduction in the repo rate by 50 basis points, bringing it down to 5.5%.
